import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import Styles from "./MasonryGridLayout.module.css"; import { Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import AnimatedQuote from "../AnimatedQuote/AnimatedQuote"; import MyCard from "./myCard"; import Fade from "@material-ui/core/Fade"; export default function MasonryGridLayout() { const [show, setShow] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setShow(false); }, [4000]); }); return (
{false && ( )}
); }
